Hi, Commander
With your love and support, Art of War has reached its 1st anniversary!
Events with awesome rewards have been prepared to celebrate the 1st anniversary. Join the festivities!
Event Content:
 - Log in every day during the event and obtain daily rewards.
 - Make a cake for great rewards.
 - Birthday Bash in the Headhunt
 - New skin of Hohenheim
 - New theme: Crazy birthday party
